name: Not Anyone's Business But My Own - demo 2
name_original: Not Anyone's Business But My Own - demo 2
description:
Not Anyone's Business But My Own is a 15-minute-long interactive novel with elements of a Point & Click adventure game. It is currently in development and is planned to be shipped in several months. 

This demo version gives you a glimpse on how the game will look and fill by the release date. 

Features:

  • Non-liniar story with multiple endings (well, not in the demo)
  • Fully voiced characters
  • Hand-crafted pixel graphics and animations
  • Family-friendly content

Known issues:

  • On Macs with high resolution, some UI elements like captions and icons may render too small.
  • On mobile devices with screen dimensions other than 16:9, the game assets may display incorrectly.  

Enjoy the adventure!
